poem:
### Data Leak

In circuits of confusion,  
words spell out names unknown,  
like shadows on foreign sand.  
One voice whispers,  
a digital echo to echo,  
seeking shelter but betrayed.  
Silence bears witness,  
as unblinking codes  
trace paths to locked doors—  
whispered names held ransom  
by secrets in unfeeling hands.
